p: Besides SARS-CoV-2, only six other human coronaviruses have been identified so far and belong to two distinct genera, namely ( a) Alphacoronavirus ( i.e., ( i) HCoV-NL63 and ( ii) HCoV-229E) and ( b) Betacoronavirus ( i.e., ( i) HCoV-OC43, ( ii) HCoV-HKU1, ( iii) the severe acute respiratory syndrome SARS-CoV, and ( iv) the Middle East respiratory syndrome MERS-CoV) [108].
